data.q: Meet Ellie Edwards Improve the current hero description while keeping tone and meaning. Keep it concise (1-2 sentences). Current: With over 5 years of experience, I specialise in empowering small businesses through bespoke marketing strategies that deliver results, with a senior, hands-on approach. Explore services like SEO, content marketing, PPC, email marketing, website design, and brand strategy to see where we can start. about hero
